title: Duramo 10 Wide Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description:
Whether you're headed out for a morning run or meeting up with friends for an evening out, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas wide-fit shoes. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Grey Four / Vivid Red / Iron Metallic

title: Forum Low Shoes
subtitle: Infant & Toddler Originals
description:
They're at the age when everything is fascinating. So they'll delight in the iridescent details of these toddlers' adidas Forum shoes. The iconic silhouette gets a fun update in muted rainbow colors along the underlay. Elastic laces with a hook-and-loop strap makes them easy to get on and off wiggly feet.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: Nizza Platform Mid Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description:
Basketball shoes in the 1970s broke through to inspire style for everyday wear. Decades later, that look is still going strong in sneakers that take you from the morning routine to your evening out. With a vulcanized platform outsole and mid-ankle profile, this pair from adidas simplifies the silhouette to match up with almost any outfit. Thick laces and 3-Stripes along the sides keep the vibe classic, and clean-looking canvas is durable for daily life. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Almost Blue / Pantone / Wonder White

title: Swift Run Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description: An everyday go-to with subtle sport styling, the Swift Run is made for the daily grind. It draws on heritage adidas running styles and gives them a new spin. These shoes feature a stretchy, sock-like knit upper for a close fit and supportive comfort. Floating 3-Stripes and embroidered lines on the forefoot make a subtle style statement.
colors: Raw White / Core Black / Carbon

title: adidas x Disney Suru365 Miss Piggy Muppets Slip-On Shoes
subtitle: Infant & Toddler Sportswear
description:
Statement shoes for little superstars. From the bows on the straps to the hot-pink color, these infants' adidas sneakers are inspired by Disney's Miss Piggy and flash an embroidered piggy graphic on the side. They slide on and off easily and have a robust, comfy outsole to match the energy of even the most spirited toddlers. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: Superstar 360 2.0 Boots
subtitle: Children Originals
description:
Inspired by the adidas Superstar sneaker, these ready-for-anything boots take cues from that shoe's best design details, right down to the iconic shell toe. A cozy insulated PrimaLoft® upper keeps kids' feet nice and warm, and rugged traction grips slippery surfaces for safe play. Speed laces mean kids can secure their own boots, even with gloves on. The EVA midsole and OrthoLite® sockliner deliver comfort.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: NMD_R1 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Running style made for everyday exploration. These adidas NMD_R1 Shoes update the original '80s-inspired trainer with a reflective RPU cage. A stretchy knit upper hugs your foot for comfort on the go. Long commutes and slick city sidewalks are no problem, thanks to energy-returning BOOST midsole cushioning and the grippy rubber outsole beneath your feet.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

title: Superstar Shoes
subtitle: Infant & Toddler Originals
description: Pro players swore by them. Hip hop legends wrote songs about them. And everybody still loves them. These toddlers' adidas Superstar Shoes show off the same classic lines as the first pairs in the '70s. Strap closures take the place of laces for easy on and off.

Kids learn from falling down and getting back up. These adidas trainers have the good looks to become their go-tos, but they're also built to withstand a lot of play. The chunky, durable EVA outsole and Cloudfoam cushioning make every step feel soft and springy. Elastic laces stretch so they slip on easily, and hook-and-loop straps can be adjusted for a comfy fit. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Aluminium / Wonder White / Grey One

description: Elevate a casual look, quite literally, with these adidas shoes. Slightly pumped-up outsoles add a little height while the soft textile upper gives them a textured look that pairs well with jeans, skirts or sporty shorts. Cloudfoam cushioning keeps your feet comfortable when you're on the move.
colors: Cloud White / Semi Turbo / Pulse Amber

description:
From a morning gym session to a day of errands to an evening with friends, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas shoes. Pair them with your favorite running shorts for the ultimate athletic-casual vibe. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Pulse Blue / Impact Orange

description:
From building to storytelling, LEGO® toys are a big part of your little one's world. So it makes sense they're also a big part of these toddlers' adidas shoes. Because LEGO® bricks can be made into anything, from the 3-Stripes on the upper to the clever grippy pods on the outsole. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content.
colors: Off White / Bliss Lilac / Core Black

description: Own the sidewalks, even on cool days. With a luxurious nubuck leather upper, these adidas Forum shoes transform a basketball icon to up your game in the city. All the details that made this mid top shoe a classic are still apparent — from the X-ankle and adjustable strap to the perforated toe. Only now, it has a modern, monochromatic style and a rugged edge.
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Cloud White

description:
Embrace your inner optimist with these juniors' adidas Nizza shoes. Bright colors on the 3-Stripes elevate your mood. Customizable lace beads give an extra dose of fashion. The platform outsole adds a little extra height and comfort, while the rubber toe and vulcanized outsole amp up the style points.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Despite the adrenaline-pumping excitement of the sport, the culture surrounding skateboarding is notoriously laid-back. These kids' shoes channel that relaxed feel into a stylish everyday sneaker. All the hallmarks of a classic skate shoe are elevated with stitched-in adidas 3-Stripes on the side.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

Toddlers are discovering everything for the first time, and these adidas x LEGO® shoes offer all sorts of possibilities. The rubber outsole isn't just grippy, it's studded in LEGO® bricks. And hook-and-loop straps aren't just for grown ups, little ones can stick them down too. From small steps, get ready for some giant leaps.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content.
colors: Grey Three / Shock Blue / Grey Six

description: Any time you're on your feet is a good time to wear these adidas Ultraboost shoes. Equipped with all the performance technology that runners love, they're updated with extra attention to detail – just look at the contrast stitching at the toe. Energy-returning BOOST in the midsole and a foot-hugging adidas PRIMEKNIT upper make sure of it.
colors: Magic Mauve / Magic Mauve / Ecru Tint

description:
These adidas shoes pop with the fearless energy of the 2000s. Bold, bright and absolutely radiating positivity, they're here to spread the vibes. Good ones only. 

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.
colors: Purple / Purple / Bliss

description:
Your little nature lover loves exploring the world around them, so they'll delight in spreading the love and celebrating the planet with these toddlers' adidas Stan Smith shoes designed in collaboration with André Saraiva. Saraiva's collection aspires to inspire an appreciation for sustainability. The graffiti-style artwork pairs with his signature smiling Mr. A character to give your little one plenty of reasons to smile. Pink accents add pops of color for extra brightness.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

With the help of 1.2 million foot scans, we updated Ultraboost with a complete 360° female fit improvement. And we didn't stop there. We re-engineered the rubber outsole. We tested hundreds of prototypes. We kept going until we saw visible improvements in performance. The result? 4% more forefoot energy return, compared to Ultraboost 21 for women. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes a narrower heel fit, designed to avoid heel slip and blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole with a Linear Energy Push system. The shoe's upper is made with yarn containing 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
colors: Beam Pink / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
Comfort isn't something we take lightly. Which is why we packed these adidas sneakers with innovations borrowed from running shoes. Responsive BOOST cushioning lets you walk all day in comfort, and the knit upper feels like a soft hug. Translation? Wherever you're going, you feel good. And with the signature NMD style, you look good too.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
colors: Bright Orange / Bright Orange / Core Black

description:
Slow them down? Not a chance. Set them up to explore in comfort in these kids' adidas shoes. Rooted in running but designed for all-day play, they keep feet comfortable with a supportive knit mesh upper and a cushioned EVA midsole. Oh, and they look good too. Win win. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Grey Five / Cloud White

description: Wherever you're going, get there in comfort. The adidas OZWEEGO shoes are packed with it. Rooted in '90s running shoes and mutated with style in mind, they step up all your outfits with elevated details. A nubuck build with suede overlays adds zebra print and pops of purple. The result is a look that's both unapologetic and easy to wear.
colors: Linen Green / Dash Grey / Feather Grey

description: Find your flow as you explore from the pavement to the trails. These adidas Terrex trail running shoes feature a modest lugged outsole made for smooth transitions between paved, gravel and dirt surfaces. The upper hugs the foot with a lightweight, breathable mesh for dynamic support that lets your foot expand and flex over mixed terrain. The adidas Lightstrike midsole reduces weight while extending comfort. Continental™ Rubber offers the all-condition grip you need to move with confidence across any surface, wet or dry.
colors: Wonder Steel / Magic Grey Met / Impact Orange

description:
Running shoes that walk the line between sport and style. These juniors' adidas sneakers layer the iconic 3-Stripes over a distinctive Marimekko print. And the elastic straps keep the look sleek. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Purple Tint / Cloud White / Collegiate Navy

description:
Agility, cardio, strength. These adidas trail running shoes support your strides on rugged paths with a Traxion outsole that maximizes grip in all directions. A breathable upper welcomes airflow to keep you feeling fresh from the first step to the last.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Help your little one embrace the magical feeling of seeing a rainbow. This whimsical spin on these classic adidas Stan Smith shoes inspires toddlers to explore their world with added color. Faded iridescent underlays provide a playful pattern that catches the eye. A snug fit with an OrthoLite® sockliner ensures that their feet will be comfy all day long.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste

You strive to get better with each and every run. Race day or fartlek workout, these adidas shoes are designed to help you make your goals reality. Lightweight Lightstrike cushioning is comfortable and resilient. TORSIONRODS deliver snappy propulsion to keep you moving toward the finish.

Swerve. Control. Power. adidas Predator has all angles covered. Hit the pitch and find your edge in these firm ground soccer cleats. Deployed across their coated textile upper, grippy Control Zone print assists you with every touch of the ball. Underneath, an eye-catching, angular TPU outsole ensures you stay in charge on dry natural grass.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Vivid Red

description: The Ultraboost isn't our first performance running shoe to hold appeal in the realm of fashion. It's just one of the most beloved. That's why we made the Ultraboost DNA, a lifestyle trainer built off the bones of its more technical namesake. The simplicity of the design shines a spotlight on the pattern of the adidas PRIMEKNIT. And because comfort's a non-negotiable, run or no run, BOOST offers incredible energy return in every step.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Beam Green

description: Calling all explorers. Give your go-anywhere, try-anything kid a pair of shoes to match. Clean adidas design keeps your little MVP styling on the playground or in the backyard. Hits of holographic accents level up the space-inspired look. Three, two, one, BLAST OFF. (Who are we kidding? They were already gone at two.)

Getting in a few miles or running to the store. These adidas shoes have all the techs to make short-distance training a breeze, and you'll want to wear them on rest days too. The upper has cutouts for airflow, acting like a harness for the stretchy inner bootie. The BOOST midsole is wrapped in 3D Stretchweb to enhance the feeling of energy return.
colors: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Grey One

description: Loud and exuberant — two words that reflect Gilbert Arenas' style on and off the hardwood. These signature adidas basketball shoes live up to that intent with a bright upper and tiger-print details. Energy-returning BOOST responds to every move, and outsole pods give you the lateral traction you need to change directions like Agent Gil.
colors: Pantone / Core Black / Vivid Green

description:
Always a step above. These adidas platform shoes give you a little extra height while providing the comfort of your trusty everyday sneakers. A bright metallic textile upper has a distinct color-shifting effect. Grippy tread patterns on the Vulcanized outsole let you make the most of your kicks, no matter where they take you next.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

Why should you settle for anything less than outrageously comfortable? The adidas NMD_R1 shoes ensure you don't have to, packing running-shoe technology into a daily pair. As you answer the call of city adventures, you'll have responsive BOOST cushioning and a soft knit upper giving feet a heel-to-toe hug. We don't expect you to compromise on style either. These sleek shoes evolve an '80s design. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Bright Orange / Bright Orange / Core Black

description:
These comfy adidas shoes balance a running-inspired shape with a fit that's snug from every angle. There's Geofit padding to support the ankles, and the Cloudfoam Super midsole has a light, springy feel. So the whole foot feels cushioned, whether or not you're running around in them. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Carbon

description:
Basketball shoes in the 1970s broke through to inspire style for everyday wear. Decades later, that look is still going strong in sneakers that take you from the morning routine to your evening out. With a chunky vulcanized platform outsole, this pair from adidas simplifies the silhouette to match up with almost any outfit. Thick laces and 3-Stripes along the sides keep the vibe classic and tailored. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Cloud White

description:
A play on the past, the adidas Retropy F2 Shoes explore nostalgia through a futuristic lens. We took inspiration from classic '80s running styles and then upped the game with fresh proportions and impactful design cues. Aside from the look, there's a reason these sneakers will become your everyday go-to — the durable textile upper and cushioned EVA midsole are all about those long days and nights, supporting your moves with absolute comfort.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Grey Three / Core Black / Grey Five

description:
Log your miles on a running shoe designed to impress with the adidas by Stella McCartney Solarglide Running Shoes. Mixing design and function, these shoes combine the best of both worlds.

The lightweight knit upper, made in part with recycled materials, will keep your feet snug on any run around 10k. The shoes get their signature look thanks to the striking speed-inspired cage. The cage is built to give you extra support with every step. 

Thanks to the flexible outsole and BOOST midsole, you'll feel energized on a run or throughout your day. They look as stylish on a run as under a pair of jeans.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

description:
From the hardwood to the hip hop stage, the adidas Superstar Shoes have solidified their place as an icon. This pair adds a touch of luxury with metallic gold-rimmed marble jewels on the laces and marble detailing on the heel. A memory foam sockliner keeps your feet comfortable.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Gold Metallic

description: Throw it back to early adidas running style with the TRX Vintage shoes. The textile upper with suede overlays bring quintessential heritage adidas vibes. An EVA midsole ups the comfort level.
colors: Wonder Steel / Crystal White / Legend Ink

description: An icon born on the tennis court more than 50 years ago, the adidas Stan Smith shoes have been worn in every corner of the world. Now they're part of our effort to help protect it. We teamed up with Parley for the Oceans to reimagine the beloved style, with tongue webbing and a heel strap made using upcycled plastic waste. The '70s vibes are still going strong, but innovative materials take a step toward the future.

Everything you've wanted in a lightweight hiker is here. This adidas mid-height hiking shoe is perfect for fast movement on all-terrain trails. Extra ankle support helps you maneuver roots, rocks and muddy downhills. The Traxion rubber outsole has deep lugs for confidence on otherwise unsure footing. The ripstop upper gives them a look to wear from mountains to city.

Every day in the city is different from the last. New sights. New ideas. Hit the pavement and keep pace with the commotion in these adidas NMD_R1 shoes. They're built on a design from our running archives, so they're definitely up to the task of daily commutes and weekend rambles. BOOST cushioning and a stretchy knit upper have you covered with comfort. Midsole plugs serve up bold NMD style.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

description:
Running style made for everyday exploration. These adidas NMD_R1 shoes update the original '80s-inspired shoes with a speckled pattern on the midsole. A stretchy knit upper hugs your foot for comfort on the go. Long commutes and slick city sidewalks are no problem, thanks to energy-returning BOOST midsole cushioning and the grippy rubber outsole beneath your feet.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

description: A '70s style reborn. These shoes take inspiration from iconic sport styles of the past and move them into the future. The shoes craft an everyday look with a smooth leather upper. Signature 3-Stripes flash along the sides. Plush midsole cushioning gives comfort to every step.
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
Better with every run. The adidas Supernova shoes are designed for the early days of running, when you build up ease and distance every time you head out the door. This version is created with running group Tinman Elite. It's made in part with recycled materials, with a soft synthetic upper on an energy-returning BOOST midsole.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Curiosity and adventure go hand in hand. These kids' adidas trail running shoes fuel the fun with a colorful LEGO Group collaboration and all the tech kids need to explore. A grippy Traxion outsole offers confident footing for everything from off-trail rock hopping to playground games. The micro-adjustable BOA® Fit System lets them dial in a snug fit on the fly, and a cushioned midsole keeps feet comfy all day long.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
